title: Chemical degradation of oxygenated polymers: the case of polyethers and polysiloxanes
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00093E, Tutorial Review
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shamna Salahudeen, Tabea A. Thiel, Esteban Mejía
A review of the most representative advances in the chemical degradation of polythers and polysiloxanes, both in academia and industry.
